site_name: Land On Side Of Wimbledon Common AtJunction Of Robin Hood Way And Grasmere AvenueKingston ValeLondonSW15 3PW
application_type_full: Prior Approval: Development for electronic communications network
description: Installation of 20m Phase 8 monopole tower with wrapround cabinet at base and associated ancillary works
decision_conditions: The proposed telecoms equipment by virtue of its siting and appearance would result in an incongruous addition to the streetscene that would be visually intrusive and create visual clutter and would not be in keeping with and detract from the character and appearance of the surrounding area a Strategic Area of Special Character and the setting of the adjacent Metropolitan Open Land. The proposal would not accord with policies CS8, DM5, DM10 and DM12 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.

Biodiversity Checklist - The Validation Local List requires a completed Biodiversity Checklist for all applications. Please download and complete a copy of the Biodiversity Checklist from: https://www.kingston.gov.uk/downloads/download/261/validation-requirements-for-planning-applications
The applicant can find information regarding Article 4 directions within the borough by following this link;https://www.kingston.gov.uk/policy/article-4-directions/3
